com.emc.vipr.services.lib

Class ViprConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.services.lib.ViprConfig

  • public class ViprConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions to configure ViPR through a vipr.properties file located on either the classpath or in the user's home directory.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        public static java.util.Properties getProperties()
                                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Locates and loads the properties file for the test configuration. This file can reside in one of two places: somewhere in the CLASSPATH or in the user's home directory.
        Returns:
        the contents of the properties file as a Properties object.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file was not found
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error reading the file.

      • getProxyUri

        public static java.lang.String getProxyUri(java.util.Properties p)

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyNotEmpty(java.util.Properties p,
                                   java.lang.String key)
        Utility method that gets a key from a Properties object and throws a RuntimeException if the key does not exist or is not set.
        Parameters:
        p -
        key -
